job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
We are looking for a research-oriented engineer to design, develop and test algorithms and architectures for unstructured information retrieval and classification. As a full-time engineer, you will take ownership of research and development of various algorithms for information extraction, language understanding and image processing. You will also be involved in writing scripts for web crawling, data cleansing and model validation.
Preferred Educational Qualifications
B.Tech/M.Tech with relevant projects.
Required Skills
C/C++/Python
Tensorflow/PyTorch
OpenCV or similar toolkits
Exposure to NLP in a professional environment
Strong theoretical understanding of probability theory and machine learning
Strong understanding of data structures and algorithms
Desired Skills
Building web applications and creating REST APIs
Databases - SQL or NoSQL
If you're data-driven and are looking to work on cutting-edge research and development, apply right away!
